java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>
public class Application
extends Entity

Representation of a Splunk application, commonly referred to as an 'app'.

Method Detail

getAuthor

public java.lang.String getAuthor()
Returns the app's author name, or null if not specified. If a splunkbase app, this should be the username of the splunk.com account. For internal apps, this should be full contact info.

Returns:
Splunk author's name string.

getCheckForUpdates

public boolean getCheckForUpdates()
Returns whether or not Splunk checks splunkbase for updates.

Returns:
Whether or not Splunk checks splunkbase for updates.

getDescription

public java.lang.String getDescription()
Returns the description string which is a short explanatory note that is displayed underneath the app's title in Launcher, or null if not specified.

Returns:
The description string.

getLabel

public java.lang.String getLabel()
Returns the label string of the app which shows in the Splunk GUI or Launcher, or null if not specified.

Returns:
The label string.

getVersion

public java.lang.String getVersion()
Returns the version string of the app, or null if not specified.

Returns:
The version string of the app.

isConfigured

public boolean isConfigured()
Returns an indication if the app's custom setup has been performed. This field is only available in Splunk's version 4.2.4+.

Returns:
Indicates if the app's custom setup has been performed.

isManageable

public boolean isManageable()
Returns whether or not the app can be managed by Splunk Manager.

Returns:
Indicates if the app can be managed by Splunk Manager or not.

isVisible

public boolean isVisible()
Returns whether or not an app is visible and navigable from the Splunk GUI.

Returns:
Indicates if the app is visible and navigable from the Splunk GUI.

stateChangeRequiresRestart

public boolean stateChangeRequiresRestart()
Indicates whether ot not an app state change requires the app to be restarted.

Returns:
Indicates if the app needs to be restarted.

archive

public ApplicationArchive archive()
Archives the appliction into a .spl file on the server's file system. The return object contains location specific information.

Returns:
Archival information of the app.

setup

public ApplicationSetup setup()
Returns the the app's setup information.

Returns:
Returns the app's setup information.

update

public ApplicationUpdate update()
Returns update information of the app.

Returns:
Returns update information for the app.
